Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: クウ・ホウ
Entry.EnglishText: Ke Hao

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人の声
Entry.EnglishText: Man's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン・ギンの屋敷
Entry.EnglishText: Wang Gin's Mansion

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、誰か客を 迎えに行って来い。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, someone needs to go welcome our guests.

Entry.JapaneseText: お客さんのお迎え？
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome the guests?

Entry.JapaneseText: オークションに参加する上得意が そろそろ三組ほど到着しているはずだ。 探して連れてこい。
Entry.EnglishText: We have three customers who are regulars at the auction that will be arriving shortly. Find them and bring them here.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街の周辺は盗賊がよく出る。 客が大金を持って歩いていたら 街の中といえど、狙われるおそれもある。 しっかりと警護しろよ。
Entry.EnglishText: There are many bandits around here. Since our guests have large sums of money on them, they're likely to be targeted even in town. Escort them here without incident.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Got it.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちの警備も怠るな。 迎えに行くのは三人でいい。 おまえと、あと二人だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You can't leave the mansion unguarded. Three people can go and escort the guests. You, and two others.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>はご指名か。 残りの二人は誰にするんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: I guess you get to pick then, <Veigue>. Who do you want to go with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120><unk18:48F40480><Veigue>は迎えに行く。 <unk18:48F80480><Mao>は<unk18:48D80480> <unk18:48FC0480><Eugene>は<unk18:48DC0480> <unk18:48000580><Annie>は<unk18:48E00480> <unk18:48040580><Tytree>は<unk18:48E40480> <unk18:48080580><Hilda>は<unk18:48E80480> <White> 決定してパーティを編成する
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120><unk18:48F40480>The ones coming with <Veigue> are... <unk18:48F80480><Mao> will<unk18:48D80480> <unk18:48FC0480><Eugene> will<unk18:48DC0480> <unk18:48000580><Annie> will<unk18:48E00480> <unk18:48040580><Tytree> will<unk18:48E40480> <unk18:48080580><Hilda> will<unk18:48E80480> <White>Take them along with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Green><Veigue>は迎えに行かなければなりません。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Green>You can't leave <Veigue> behind.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Green>迎えに行くのは<Veigue>を含めて三人です。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Green>You need three people including <Veigue> to retrieve the guests.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちぇっ、留守番かよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Tch, stuck on guard duty...

Entry.JapaneseText: つまんないのぉ…… ボクも行きたいのにぃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Boooring... I wanted to go too!

Entry.JapaneseText: それぞれの役割を果たすんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's see to our respective jobs.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の客も着いているはず。 行って来い。
Entry.EnglishText: Another guest should be arriving around now. Go and get him.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ他にも客が来る 予定になっている。 迎えに行ってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: We're still expecting one more guest. Go and get him.

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労。 あとは、オークション終了まで この周囲の警備をしろ。
Entry.EnglishText: Good work. Now we need you to patrol the perimeter until the auction is over.

Entry.JapaneseText: あと一組ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: There is one more person left after this.

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ、どこへ行くんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie, where are you going?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>さんのところじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: He's probably going to wherever <Claire> is, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうか……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, right...

Entry.JapaneseText: 早いとこ、最後のお得意様を お迎えに行こうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Well, let's get going. We still need to pick up the last guest!

Entry.JapaneseText: キキッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Kiki!

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ…… 何をくわえている？
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie... What do you have in your mouth?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Claire>の字だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...This is <Claire>'s handwriting!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ？ 何が書いてあるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What did she write?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「閉じ込められています。助けて」 ……これは!!
Entry.EnglishText: "I'm locked up. Help me." It can't be...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 閉じ込められたって、 どういう事なの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why on earth would they have locked her up?!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁー！
Entry.EnglishText: Uwaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: あーあ、あんなところで、 <Veigue>が殴っちゃうから……
Entry.EnglishText: Aw man... Why did <Veigue> have to go and deck the guy...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、<Veigue>。よくやった！ おれはおまえの味方だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Nah, <Veigue>, you did good! I'm with you, pal!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、あんた…… よくやったって……これからどうするのよ。 せっかく教えてもらえそうだったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, honestly... Saying he did good... What are we supposed to do now? He was just about to talk...

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンへ行けば、 <Cyan>幻の庭<White>の事を知ってる 奴に会えるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: If you go to Nolzen, you might find someone who knows about the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔、ノルゼンの辺りで、 <Cyan>幻の庭<White>に関する噂を 耳にした事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: A long time ago, I heard rumors about the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White> when I was in the vicinity of Nolzen.

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンだな……わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen, huh? All right.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、どうしてそんな事、 教えてくれるんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: But why are you giving us this information?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何故だろうな。 おまえがあの男を殴った時、 胸がスカッとした…… だからかもしれん。
Entry.EnglishText: Good question. When I saw you punch him back there, it felt like there was a weight taken off my chest... I guess that's why.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあな……
Entry.EnglishText: Later...

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪い人じゃなかったんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems as though he wasn't such a bad person after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ワン・ギンに、あまり良い 感情を持っていないようでした。 何か事情があるのかもしれません……
Entry.EnglishText: That man did not seem to harbor much good will towards Wang Gin. I wonder what sort of situation he is in...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクたちも行こうか？ フランツさんにも、<Cyan>幻の庭<White>の 事を教えてあげようよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We should get going, huh? Let's tell Frantz what we just learned.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迎えに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: come with.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>
Entry.EnglishText: <Yellow>

Entry.JapaneseText: 会場の警備をする。
Entry.EnglishText: stand guard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Blue>

Entry.JapaneseText: クウ・ホウ
Entry.EnglishText: Ke Hao

Entry.JapaneseText: 金持ちの護衛なんて、 やってられないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't stand having to guard this rich man's house...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>メンバーを変更しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Switch Places? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、おれも行きたいぜ。 交代してくんねーか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I want to come too. Can I switch places with someone?

Entry.JapaneseText: 静かすぎて、かえって 不安になりますね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's too quiet... I'm starting to feel anxious.

Entry.JapaneseText: 油断は禁物だ。 必要なら交代するぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't let your guard down. I'll come with you, if you need me.

Entry.JapaneseText: とっても退屈なんですけど。 メンバー交代しようよー？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I'm bored. Wanna take me with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 会場内の警備は 俺たちの担当だ。
Entry.EnglishText: We're in charge of the hall's security.

Entry.JapaneseText: お前らは 会場周りの警備をしていろ。
Entry.EnglishText: You guys need to guard the perimeter.

Entry.JapaneseText: オークションの客を迎えに行くよう、 クウ・ホウ様に言い付かってる はずだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Didn't Sir Ke Hao order you to retrieve the guests who are attending the auction?

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く行ってこい！
Entry.EnglishText: Then hurry and get them!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはこの街の有力者、 ワン・ギン様の屋敷だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the mansion of this town's most influential person, Wang Gin.

Entry.JapaneseText: 特別、用事のない者は お引取り願っている。
Entry.EnglishText: People who have no business here should leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: 準備はできたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you ready?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>準備はできましたか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Are you ready? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 決して持ち場から離れるなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You are not to leave your post for any reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: それから、おまえは、 客の接待をしてもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: And we would like for <Italic>you</Italic> to greet our guests.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……他に人はいないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have anyone else for that?

Entry.JapaneseText: いない。 ワン・ギン様が情報の引き換えに、 とおっしゃっている。
Entry.EnglishText: No. This is part of your deal with Master Wang Gin.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わ、私……行った方が いいです……よね……？
Entry.EnglishText: I...should be going, then... Yes?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……情報を盾にしやがって…… きたない野郎だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Using that information as a shield... What a scumbag.
Come with me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 準備ができたら声をかけろと 言ってあったはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come and speak to me when you're ready.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたら…… お金がなさそうだけど…… 盗賊じゃないよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you don't look rich... You're not thieves, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの尻尾の袋…… なかなか高級そうね……
Entry.EnglishText: That tail cover of yours looks very high-quality...

Entry.JapaneseText: あら？ あんたの その服、高そうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh my, those clothes of yours seem expensive.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいくら？ 譲ってくださらない？
Entry.EnglishText: How much are you willing to sell them for?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>？ どうせ、 お宝が眠ってるとかって ヤツじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>? Surely there would be treasure hidden there?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうせ、お金には満足してるもの。 興味ないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I already have enough money, so I don't care.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ そうねえ、不老不死、かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? Well, eternal life, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ 盗賊を追い払ってくれる 強くてお金持ちの男かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? Why, I want a strong, rich man to kick those bandits out, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ ワクワクした冒険がしたいわ。 でも、面倒くさいのはキライね……
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? I want to go on an exciting adventure, but it would be too troublesome, so perhaps not...

Entry.JapaneseText: そういや、 あのフランツさんって冒険家、 北に向かったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, speaking of that... That adventurer, Frantz, headed up north...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……寒いのもイヤね……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't like the cold though...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ そうねえ、満たされた世界かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? A world that can satisfy my desires, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、どこかでケンカしてるって 話が多くて、嫌になるわ。 きっとみんな欲求不満なのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been hearing about all the fighting lately, and it sickens me. I'm sure everyone else is frustrated as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海の向こうの事なんて、 どうでもいいって思ってたのに、 何かしらねえ、この嫌な感じは。
Entry.EnglishText: I normally don't care about what happens on the other side of the ocean, but for some reason I'm bothered by what's going on...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ 「最高の耳セン」かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? The greatest earplugs, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: この音、うるさくって かなわないわよね……
Entry.EnglishText: This noise just isn't letting up...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ そうね……私の演説を聞いてくれる 聴衆たちかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? An audience that would listen to me give a speech, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様のように演説をしたら 気持ちいいでしょうね？
Entry.EnglishText: I bet it would feel great to give a speech just like the one Queen Agarte did.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ 「スリル」かしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? Something thrilling, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: いろいろ満たされちゃって、 毎日退屈なのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: I already have most of what I want, everything has gotten so boring...

Entry.JapaneseText: い、今欲しいもの…… 私を守ってくれる人よ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? Someone who would protect me...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、欲しいもの？ 私、けっこう満たされてるのよね。 ふふっ……
Entry.EnglishText: What could I want now? Well, I already have everything I want... Heehee~

Entry.JapaneseText: 勝手に入るな。 準備はできたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you're here. Are you ready?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン・ギン様に 話があるだと？
Entry.EnglishText: What business do you have with Master Wang Gin?

Entry.JapaneseText: 人を値踏みするような目で 見るんじゃないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You shouldn't eye people like they have a price tag on them.

Entry.JapaneseText: む？ そのカード……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? Those cards...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: 珍しいものを持っているな……
Entry.EnglishText: You're in possession of something rare...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……少し待っていろ。 ワン・ギン様に聞いてきてやる。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Wait here a moment. I will speak with the Master.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン・ギン様が会われるそうだ。 ただし、そっちの女……
Entry.EnglishText: He says you can come in. Provided that this woman allows it...
Me?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの持っていたカードを ワン・ギン様が見たいと おっしゃっている。
Entry.EnglishText: Master Wang Gin would like to have a look at those cards of yours.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかってるわよ。 いいわ。見せるだけならね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I understand. I'll allow it, so long as he's only going to look.

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば中へ……
Entry.EnglishText: Right this way.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
